name: touchcontroller
author: Pavol Hejn√Ω <me@pavolhejny.com> (https://pavolhejny.com)
description: Touch and mouse controller for web apps and games

scripts.preversion: npm test && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run prettier-commit && npm run documentation-commit
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish && npm run update-in-other-repos
scripts.prettier-commit: git diff --exit-code && npm run prettier && git add src && git commit --allow-empty -m "Prettier"
scripts.documentation-commit: git diff --exit-code && npm run documentation && git add docs && git commit --allow-empty -m "TouchController"
scripts.update-in-other-repos: cd ../../HeduApp/collboard && git stash && npm i touchcontroller@latest && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit --allow-empty -m "Update of touchcontroller" && git push && git stash pop
